subject: RE: [junit] problem with junit
msgSnippet: Satinder, What do you think that the errors below mean? javax.servlet.ServletException: Wrapper cannot find servlet class
messageBody:
Satinder,
What do you think that the errors below mean?

"javax.servlet.ServletException: Wrapper cannot find servlet class
org.apache.cactus.server.runner.ServletTestRunner or a class it depends on"
...
"java.lang.ClassNotFoundException:
org.apache.cactus.server.runner.ServletTestRunner"

It would be useful to know what troubleshooting you have done so far, as I'm
sure you wouldn't post to the list with a classpath error.
On that note, I have had problems with Tomcat classloaders before now.

Kind Regards,
Shaun.
